overview: Who needs a Play Station or an X Box when you've got My Best Fucking Friend who is eager to play with your thick joy stick, just so long as you play with his. These boys are BFF because they know each other so well and they are also into the exact same thing French kisses, tongue jamming and bareback fucking. It doesn't matter if they're saving water by showering together or cooking up a storm in the kitchen, these best friends are united in everything they do including doing each other at every opportunity.
title: My Best Fucking Friend
